backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing wall-of-fame entries with add, list, count, and ID generation functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented frontend features, affected files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries describing behavior and purpose of various frontend files across the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables defining light/dark color tokens and global background/foreground behavior.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML entry point setting charset, viewport, document title, and React root mount.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level component controlling navigation between intro, game, outro, and hall-of-fame phases.
frontend/src/components/WallOfFameLink.t: Floating button component that triggers navigation to the Wall of Fame view.
frontend/src/content/story.ts: Defines narrative story steps, text blocks, slider question, and Barnabus story content for the intro flow.
frontend/src/features/game/CollectiblesH: HUD displaying collected star count using an amber-styled badge with icon.
frontend/src/features/game/GameView.tsx: Main game logic component handling movement, collectibles, dialogs, audio, environment checks, and transitions.
frontend/src/features/game/GoalsModal.ts: Modal describing Barnabus’s goals with Escape key dismissal and a continue button.
frontend/src/features/game/jokes.ts: Exports a list of short goal-themed joke strings.
frontend/src/features/game/MobilePhoneMo: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/features/game/passability.t: Provides utilities to compute corridor passable channels and detect obstacle intersections for path validation.
frontend/src/features/game/SpeechBalloon: Speech balloon component that positions and clamps a text bubble with a tail above the character.
frontend/src/features/game/StarPickupMod: Displays a modal for star pickups with optional completion message and Escape-key dismissal.
frontend/src/features/game/useGameLoop.t: Implements a requestAnimationFrame game loop hook that invokes an update callback with delta time.
frontend/src/features/game/useGameplayAu: Manages background music and star pickup sounds, handling pauses and timed resumes.
frontend/src/features/game/useKeyboardCo: Tracks arrow-key movement and space/joke actions with disable support and event listeners.
frontend/src/features/game/worldMap.ts: Generates a random corridor path, defines map entities, and provides utilities for corridor checks and obstacles.
frontend/src/features/hall-of-fame/certi: Generates a certificate PDF by loading a template, drawing a centered name onto it, and triggering a download using pdf-lib from CDN.
frontend/src/features/hall-of-fame/HallO: Renders the Wall of Fame view, fetching entries, handling errors, and allowing certificate download.
frontend/src/features/hall-of-fame/sanit: Converts a name into a safe filename by replacing non-alphanumeric characters with underscores and trimming extras.
frontend/src/features/intro/GoalStickine: Renders a slider-based question, provides feedback on submission, and reveals a continue button after a delay.
frontend/src/features/intro/introBackgro: Computes dynamic intro gradients based on darkening steps and exports initial, final, and constants for transitions.
frontend/src/features/intro/IntroFlow.ts: Controls the multi-stage intro narrative, revealing text over time and managing gradient transitions and flow progression.
frontend/src/features/outro/NameSubmissi: Modal for entering and submitting a player's name with validation, error display, and controlled closing behavior.
frontend/src/features/outro/OutroFlow.ts: Manages the outro narrative flow, revealing text blocks, takeaways, and eventually triggering the name submission modal.
frontend/src/features/outro/TakeawayModa: React modal that displays a takeaway’s title, body, and optional link, with escape handling and styled UI.
frontend/src/features/outro/takeawaysCon: Exports structured takeaway items with titles, bodies, and optional links used by the modal and PDF.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity login, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePersistentPlayerId: Manages player ID and completion state in localStorage with setters and reset helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating Wall of Fame entries using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with theme variables, dark mode values, and custom utilities like animations and modal fade-in.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, content scanning, custom OKLCH color system, extended theming, animations, and typography/container/animate plugins.
project_state.json: JSON snapshot of the project's current feature set, including versioning, overall app summary, and a detailed list of implemented features with metadata.
